blogPost.excerpt: Axel is a virtual assistant who helps you develop a culture of transparency and ownership in your team. You set up the right 1:1 and weekly check-in from templates in a few clicks. Our secret sauce: no need to add another tool, everything is done in Slack.
blogPost.body: Axel is a virtual assistant who helps you develop a culture of transparency and ownership in your team. You set up the right 1:1 and weekly check-in from templates in a few clicks. Our secret sauce: no need to add another tool, everything is done in Slack.
blogPost.title: Axel - Powerful rituals to drive your team to success.
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Axel是一个虚拟助手，帮助您在团队中培养透明和主人翁的文化。只需单击几下，即可从模板设置正确的1：1和每周签到。我们的秘诀：不需要添加其他工具，一切都在Slake中完成。
localize.tagline: 推动您的团队走向成功的强大仪式。

localize.description: Axel是一個虛擬助手，幫助您在團隊中培養透明和主人翁的文化。只需單擊幾下，即可從模板設置正確的1：1和每週簽到。我們的祕訣：不需要添加其他工具，一切都在Slake中完成。
localize.tagline: 推動您的團隊走向成功的強大儀式。

previous.excerpt: Company in a Box is a GPT-3 powered tool that creates compelling landing pages for your startup idea in seconds. Vet more ideas, focus on the ones that stick, and start collecting leads! Coming soon: deploy ads & plug in your own Typeform waitlist.
previous.title: Company in a Box - Startup idea to leads in one click with GPT-3

localize.description: 盒子里的公司是一个GPT-3驱动的工具，它可以在几秒钟内为你的创业想法创建引人注目的登录页面。审查更多的想法，专注于那些坚持的想法，并开始收集线索！即将推出：部署广告并插入您自己的Typeform等待列表。
localize.tagline: 借助GPT-3，一键即可获得潜在客户的创业想法

localize.description: 盒子裏的公司是一個GPT-3驅動的工具，它可以在幾秒鐘內爲你的創業想法創建引人注目的登錄頁面。審查更多的想法，專注於那些堅持的想法，並開始收集線索！即將推出：部署廣告並插入您自己的Typeform等待列表。
localize.tagline: 藉助GPT-3，一鍵即可獲得潛在客戶的創業想法

next.excerpt: Planning to take time off this holiday season? The automatic out-of-office calendar from Clockwise makes it effortless to coordinate with your team. Simply mark your calendar OOO and Clockwise will sync your availability to the shared team calendar.
next.title: Automatic out-of-office calendar - Just mark your calendar as OOO, we take care of the rest

localize.description: 这个假期你打算请假吗？来自顺时针的自动外出日历使您可以毫不费力地与您的团队进行协调。只需将您的日历标记为OOO，顺时针就会将您的可用性同步到共享的团队日历。
localize.tagline: 只需将您的日历标记为OOO，我们会处理睡觉

localize.description: 這個假期你打算請假嗎？來自順時針的自動外出日曆使您可以毫不費力地與您的團隊進行協調。只需將您的日曆標記爲OOO，順時針就會將您的可用性同步到共享的團隊日曆。
localize.tagline: 只需將您的日曆標記爲OOO，我們會處理睡覺
